redPacketNotOpenedWillBeRefunded: Red Packets not opened within 24 hours will be refunded.
name: Name
enterYourNameToGetStarted: Enter your name to get started. You can change it later.
nameMustBeBetween: Name must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
toGetStartedSetYourDisplayName: To get started, set your display name:
nanChatIdDescription: NanChat ID is your short unique identifier. Your friends can use it to add you on NanChat. It can only be changed once per year.
areYouSureChangeNanChatId: Are you sure you want to change your NanChat ID to {{username}}?
canOnlyChangeNanChatIdOncePerYear: You can only change your NanChat ID once per year.
setANameToGetStarted: Set a Name to get started
nanChatIdMustBeBetween: NanChat ID must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
representativeExplanation1: A Representative is a node that votes on your behalf for network consensus.
representativeExplanation2: Representative does not have access to your funds.
representativeExplanation3: For network health, choose a trusted and online representative.
representativeExplanation4: You can change your representative at any time.
secretRecoveryPhraseWarning: Secret recovery phrase is the only way to recover your account. It is recommended to complete both backup options to help prevent loss of funds.
thisPasswordWillEncryptYourSecretPhraseF: This password will encrypt your secret phrase file.
doNotLoseYourPasswordOrYourBackupWillBeU: Do not lose your password or your backup will be unrecoverable.
doNotShareQrCodeWarning: Do not share QRCode and password with anyone. Anyone with access to it can access your wallet and funds.
selectImportAccountInstruction: Select Import Account on the new device, then Scan QRCode and enter export password:
enableNotificationsBrowser: You need to enable notifications for NanChat in your browser settings.
enableNotificationsDevice: You need to enable notifications for NanChat in your device settings.
newReceiveDesc: Get notified when you receive a new transaction
newMessageDesc: Get notified when you receive a new end-to-end encrypted message
messagePreviewDesc: Decrypt messages locally and show a preview. Enabling this may reduce the reliability of notification delivery.
priceAlertDesc: Get notified of large price changes
chatsE2EEncrypted: Your chats are end-to-end encrypted using nano
inviteFriendsShareMessage: Hey, I'm using NanChat for end-to-end encrypted chats and free secure payments! Install NanChat and add me via NanChat ID: {{username}} or via https://nanchat.com/chat/{{account}}
canceledBlocked: Canceled. This account is in your blocklist
canceledMalicious: Canceled. Malicious network detected, tried to send {{wrongTicker}} instead of {{ticker}}
transactionsAppearHere: Your transactions will appear here on the {{network}} network.
verifyWithAndSave: Verify it with {{nameOrAccount}} and save it in your contacts for a guaranteed end-to-end encryption.
validUntil100Members: Valid until group has 100 members. Approval by a member is required to join.
publicAccountE2EInfo: Public account used for end-to-end encryption. Verify it with the group by a secure mean for a guaranteed end-to-end encryption. A new account is generated each time a participant join or leave the group.
nameValidationMsg: Name must be between 1 and 24 characters
biometricsAuthCanceledContent: You canceled the biometrics authentication. Do you want to try again or create a PIN Code?
messagesAndPaymentsBlocked: Messages and payments to this account will be blocked.
passwordWillEncryptSecretPhrase: Password will be used to encrypt your secret phrase and will be required to unlock NanChat.
requirePasswordTitle: Require a password to open NanChat ?
passwordWarning: Your password cannot be recovered if you forget it!
disablePasswordDesc: You will no longer need a password to open NanChat.
disablePasswordWebWarning: Your secret phrase will be stored unencrypted on this device. Make sure your device cannot be accessed by unauthorized users.
passwordMandatoryWeb: Password is mandatory on web version.
toUseSecureStorage: to use secure storage without a password.
confirmationRequiredToSend: If enabled, confirmation will be required to send transactions.
confirmationNotEncryptSecretKey: Please note that this does not encrypt your secret key. To encrypt your secret key, always use a password.
lockAfterInactivityInfo: If enabled, password will be required after a period of inactivity.
authenticationFailed: Failed to authenticate. This method may be not supported on your device.
minReceiveAmountInfo: Filter out low value transactions, this can protect your account from dust transactions spam and make address poisoning more expensive.
minReceiveAmountDisableInfo: You can set it to 0 to disable this feature.
deleteAccountContent: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Your messages and contacts will be permanently deleted.
newChatRequestDesc: Get notified when you receive a new chat request
invalidNaultData: Invalid data. Make sure you copied the data correctly from Nault. URL should start with https://nault.cc/import-address-book#
importFromNaultStep1: 1) Open Nault and go to Address Book
importFromNaultStep2: 2) Click on "IMPORT / EXPORT" at the top, select "Export Address Book" and click "COPY TO CLIPBOARD"
importFromAppStep2: 2) Click on the Export button at the top right
contactsFromFileSupported: Nault, Natrium and Kalium export file supported
yourContactsNotOnNanChat: Your contacts not yet on NanChat
deleteContactConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
